channel.description: Recent content in laptop on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-03
item.description: Twitter reportedly working on new feature to let users write full articles (2 minute read) Twitter Articles is a new experimental feature that will let Twitter users write longer texts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-10
item.description: Netflix tests a TikTok-style feed for kids (2 minute read) Netflix is testing a new feed on its iOS app designed for kids.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-23
item.description: Facebook names a new CTO with a major focus on hardware (2 minute read) Facebook has promoted Andrew Bosworth, the current head of its hardware division, to the role of chief technology officer.
